features.0: A strange red glow emanates from all the leaves
features.1: At night, the woods lay down like theyâ€™re sleeping
features.2: Through the trees you can see yourself peering in
features.3: Trees move about whenever you look away

features.5: A shimmer of an old camp appears at twilight. Some nights, someone is having a campfire.
